snippet: Consolidated Edison reported Saturday afternoon that about 6,250 of its 348,000 customers in the county were still without power.
abstract: Westchester County continues to recover from Hurricane Sandy but Consolidated Edison reports about 6,250 of its 348,000 customers are still without power; status of recovery efforts highlighted in chart..
lead_paragraph: Consolidated Edison reported Saturday afternoon that about 6,250 of its 348,000 customers in the county were still without power.

headline.seo: Updates to Service Restoration in Westchester County
